name: CI Pipeline
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - dev
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      
      - name: Add README Badge
        run: |
          if [ ! -f README.md ]; then
            echo "# Mi Proyecto" > README.md
          fi
          BADGE_URL="https://github.com/${{ github.repository }}/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg"
          BADGE_LINE="![CI Pipeline Status]($BADGE_URL)"
          
          # AÃ±adir badge al inicio del README si no existe
          if ! grep -q "$BADGE_LINE" README.md; then
            sed -i "1i $BADGE_LINE\n" README.md
          fi
      
      - name: Commit Changes
        run: |
          git config --local user.email "action@github.com"
          git config --local user.name "GitHub Action"
          git add README.md
          git commit -m "Add workflow status badge" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push
